text: John Graham "Mac" McVie (born 26 November 1945) is a British bass guitarist. He is best known as a member of rock groups John Mayall & the Bluesbreakers and Fleetwood Mac. He joined Fleetwood Mac shortly after its formation by guitarist Peter Green in 1967. He replaced bassist Bob Brunning. In 1968, he married blues pianist and singer Christine Perfect, who became a member of Fleetwood Mac two years later. John and Christine McVie divorced, however, in 1977. On 27 October 2013, Fleetwood Mac announced on their Facebook Page that McVie had been diagnosed with cancer and would be undergoing treatment.https://www.facebook.com/FleetwoodMac URL last accessed 2013-12-27 He has continued to play with the band during their 2014 On With The Show tour following an improvement in his condition. ==References== ==Other websites== * Fleetwood Mac official website * Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:British bass guitarists Category:English rock guitarists Category:Musicians from London Category:Fleetwood Mac members
